info.title: Cloud Services for RHEL Compliance API v2
info.description: This is the API for Cloud Services for RHEL Compliance. You can find out more about Red Hat Cloud Services for RHEL at [https://console.redhat.com/](https://console.redhat.com/)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of first item of paginated response

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Attribute and direction to sort the items by. Represented by an array of fields with an optional direction (`:asc` or `:desc`).

If no direction is selected, `:asc` is used by default.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Query string to filter items by their attributes. Compliant with scoped_search query language. However, only `=` or `!=` (resp. `<>`) operators are supported.

Profiles are searchable using attributes `title` and `ref_id`

(e.g.: `(version=0.1.47 AND os_major_verision=8)`)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of first item of paginated response

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Attribute and direction to sort the items by. Represented by an array of fields with an optional direction (`:asc` or `:desc`).

If no direction is selected, `:asc` is used by default.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Query string to filter items by their attributes. Compliant with scoped_search query language. However, only `=` or `!=` (resp. `<>`) operators are supported.

Security Guides are searchable using attributes `title`, `version`, `ref_id`, and `os_major_version`

(e.g.: `(version=0.1.47 AND os_major_verision=8)`)

examples: V2::SecurityGuide not found with ID a4708198-9d00-4035-bf57-1e7aaad217c5

limit.description: Number of items returned per page

offset.description: Offset of the first item of paginated response

examples: version:asc
sort_by.description: Attribute and direction the items are sorted by

examples: title='Standard System Security Profile for Fedora'
filter.description: Query string used to filter items by their attributes

examples: xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_profile_pci-dss
CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Benchmark
This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the Center for Internet SecurityRed Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Benchmark, v2.2.0, released 12-27-2017.
xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_group_locking_out_password_attempts
Set Lockouts for Failed Password Attempt
title.description: Short title of the Rule Group

examples: By limiting the number of failed logon attempts, the risk of unauthorized system access via user password guessing, otherwise known as brute-forcing, is reduced. Limits are imposed by locking the account.

The pam_faillock PAM module provides the capability to lock out user accounts after a number of failed login attempts. Its documentation is available in /usr/share/doc/pam-VERSION/txts/README.pam_faillock.
description.description: Longer description of the Rule Group

precedence.description: The original sorting precedence of the Rule Group in the Security Guide

examples: xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_benchmark_RHEL-7
Guide to the Secure Configuration of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
title.description: Short title of the Security Guide

examples: This guide presents a catalog of security-relevant configuration settings for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.
description.description: Longer description of the Security Guide

os_major_version.description: Major version of the Operating System that the Security Guide covers

examples: xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_profile_cis
CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Benchmark

security_guide_version.description: Version of the latest Security Guide supporting this Profile

os_major_version.description: Major version of the Operating System that the Profile covers

os_minor_versions.description: List of the supported Operating System minor versions that the Profile covers

examples: xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_value_var_rekey_limit_size
SSH RekeyLimit - size
title.description: Short title of the Value Definition

examples: string
Specify the size component of the rekey limit.
description.description: Longer description of the Value Definition

default_value.description: Default value of the Value Definition
